en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},


The material listed below is overdue. Please return materials as soon as possible.

A lost item and processing fee has been assessed for each item listed. Overdue items and fines may cause suspension of borrowing and Interlibrary borrowing privileges.

View your account by going to My Library Account at https://mylibrary.stanford.edu/

For more information regarding charges, fines and fees see http://library.stanford.edu/using/borrow-renew-return

templates.description: Notice to recall items, due date shortened to 7 days from date item is recalled.

en.body:
The following library material has been recalled for use by another user. Please note the new recall due date below, and return it to the circulation desk on or before that date.

Failure to return material in response to a recall notice will result in overdue recall fines of $3.00 per day up to a maximum of $21.00, followed by a lost item bill and a possible block of your circulation privileges. If you have questions, please contact a circulation supervisor.

Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Recall due date: {{loan.dueDate}}

To view your account, go to My Library Account:
https://mylibrary.stanford.edu/

Your prompt response will be appreciated!

{{/loans}}

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},


Subject: **Stanford Libraries Bill for Recalled Material**

The library material below has been recalled by another user, and is overdue. Please return materials to the library listed above as soon as possible.

A lost item and processing fee has been assessed for each item listed. An overdue recall fine will be added to your account when materials are returned. Overdue materials and fines may cause suspension of your borrowing and Interlibrary borrowing privileges.

Although the library forgives fines and fees for Faculty when materials are returned, users who do not return recalled material in a timely manner negatively impact the library's ability to serve the needs of other scholars.

To view your account, go to My Library Account:
https://mylibrary.stanford.edu/

For more information regarding charges and fines, see http://library.stanford.edu/using/borrow-renew-return
{{feeCharge.amount}}.
